welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Genzano di Roma, a charming city known for its traditional festivals, picturesque streets, and delicious food. We invite you to immerse yourself in its beauty and experience all that this enchanting city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, primarily used for charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal of Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
